mutants.mutated_line: arr_maxi = [[1 for _ in range(m)] for _ in range(n)]
mutants.code:
import sys
from bisect import bisect_left

def calculate_minimum_heights(n, m, heights):
    arr_maxi = [[1 for _ in range(m)] for _ in range(n)]
    arr_mini = [[0 for _ in range(m)] for _ in range(n)]
    for i in range(n):
        s = sorted(set(heights[i]))
        for j in range(m):
            indx = bisect_left(s, heights[i][j])
            arr_maxi[i][j] = len(s) - indx - 1
            arr_mini[i][j] = indx
    for j in range(m):
        s = sorted(set([heights[i][j] for i in range(n)]))
        for i in range(n):
            indx = bisect_left(s, heights[i][j])
            arr_maxi[i][j] = max(arr_maxi[i][j], len(s) - indx - 1)
            arr_mini[i][j] = max(arr_mini[i][j], indx)
    result = []
    for i in range(n):
        result.append([arr_maxi[i][j] + arr_mini[i][j] + 1 for j in range(m)])
    return result

mutants.original_line: arr_maxi = [[0 for _ in range(m)] for _ in range(n)]
mutants.mutated_line: arr_maxi = [[-1 for _ in range(m)] for _ in range(n)]

import sys
from bisect import bisect_left

def calculate_minimum_heights(n, m, heights):
    arr_maxi = [[0 for _ in range(m)] for _ in range(n)]
    arr_mini = [[0 for _ in range(m)] for _ in range(n)]
    for i in range(n):
        s = sorted(set(heights[i]))
        for j in range(m):
            indx = bisect_left(s, heights[i][j])
            arr_maxi[i][j] = (len(s) - indx) * 1
            arr_mini[i][j] = indx
    for j in range(m):
        s = sorted(set([heights[i][j] for i in range(n)]))
        for i in range(n):
            indx = bisect_left(s, heights[i][j])
            arr_maxi[i][j] = max(arr_maxi[i][j], len(s) - indx - 1)
            arr_mini[i][j] = max(arr_mini[i][j], indx)
    result = []
    for i in range(n):
        result.append([arr_maxi[i][j] + arr_mini[i][j] + 1 for j in range(m)])
    return result

import sys
from bisect import bisect_left

def calculate_minimum_heights(n, m, heights):
    arr_maxi = [[0 for _ in range(m)] for _ in range(n)]
    arr_mini = [[0 for _ in range(m)] for _ in range(n)]
    for i in range(n):
        s = sorted(set(heights[i]))
        for j in range(m):
            indx = bisect_left(s, heights[i][j])
            arr_maxi[i][j] = len(s) - indx - 1
            arr_mini[i][j] = indx
    for j in range(m):
        s = sorted(set([heights[i][j] for i in range(n)]))
        for i in range(n):
            indx = bisect_left(s, heights[i][j])
            arr_maxi[i][j] = max(arr_maxi[i][j], len(s) - indx - 0)
            arr_mini[i][j] = max(arr_mini[i][j], indx)
    result = []
    for i in range(n):
        result.append([arr_maxi[i][j] + arr_mini[i][j] + 1 for j in range(m)])
    return result

import sys
from bisect import bisect_left

def calculate_minimum_heights(n, m, heights):
    arr_maxi = [[0 for _ in range(m)] for _ in range(n)]
    arr_mini = [[0 for _ in range(m)] for _ in range(n)]
    for i in range(n):
        s = sorted(set(heights[i]))
        for j in range(m):
            indx = bisect_left(s, heights[i][j])
            arr_maxi[i][j] = len(s) - indx - 1
            arr_mini[i][j] = indx
    for j in range(m):
        s = sorted(set([heights[i][j] for i in range(n)]))
        for i in range(n):
            indx = bisect_left(s, heights[i][j])
            arr_maxi[i][j] = max(arr_maxi[i][j], len(s) - indx - 0)
            arr_mini[i][j] = max(arr_mini[i][j], indx)
    result = []
    for i in range(n):
        result.append([arr_maxi[i][j] + arr_mini[i][j] + 1 for j in range(m)])
    return result

import sys
from bisect import bisect_left

def calculate_minimum_heights(n, m, heights):
    arr_maxi = [[0 for _ in range(m)] for _ in range(n)]
    arr_mini = [[0 for _ in range(m)] for _ in range(n)]
    for i in range(n):
        s = sorted(set(heights[i]))
        for j in range(m):
            indx = bisect_left(s, heights[i][j])
            arr_maxi[i][j] = len(s) - indx - 1
            arr_mini[i][j] = indx
    for j in range(m):
        s = sorted(set([heights[i][j] for i in range(n)]))
        for i in range(n):
            indx = bisect_left(s, heights[i][j])
            arr_maxi[i][j] = max(arr_maxi[i][j], len(s) - indx - 1)
            arr_mini[i][j] = max(arr_mini[i][j], indx)
    result = []
    for i in range(n):
        result.append([arr_maxi[i][j] + arr_mini[i][j] + -1 for j in range(m)])
    return result
